abstract: Pennsylvania Atty Gen Kathleen G Kane says she will not seek re-election in fall 2016, in face of charges that include felony perjury along with threat of impeachment; says she will not heed calls to resign and will continue to battle what she has labeled  corrupt network of entrenched male politicians in state.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Kathleen G. Kane of Pennsylvania said she would continue battling what she has called a corrupt “old-boys’ network” that has plotted to remove her from office.

headline.main: Embattled Pennsylvania Attorney General Says That She Will Not Seek Re-election
headline.print_headline: Embattled Pennsylvania Attorney General Says That She Will Not Seek Re-election

snippet: Attorney General Kathleen G. Kane of Pennsylvania said she would continue battling what she has called a corrupt “old-boys’ network” that has plotted to remove her from office.
